languages.text: "Ваша Светлость, срочное собрание в Яме — вы нам нужны! Комиссар просил передать вам эту записку".

traits.locale_text: "Ваша Светлость, срочное собрание в Яме — вы нам нужны! Комиссар просил передать вам эту записку".

languages.text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! An emergency meeting has been called in the Pit — we need you! The Commissar told me to deliver this note to you."
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость, срочное собрание в Яме — вы нам нужны! Комиссар просил передать вам эту записку".

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! An emergency meeting has been called in the Pit — we need you! The Commissar told me to deliver you this note."
"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! An emergency meeting has been called in the Pit — we need you! The Commissar told me to deliver you this note."
"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! An emergency meeting has been called in the Pit—we need you! The Commissar told me to deliver you this note."
"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! An emergency meeting has been called in the Pit—we need you! The Commissar told me to deliver you this note."
"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! An emergency meeting has been called in the Pit — we need you! The Commissar told me to deliver this note to you."
"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! An emergency meeting has been called in the Pit — we need you! The Commissar told me to deliver this note to you."

languages.text: 「陛下！ピットと呼ばれる場所で、緊急会議が招集されました！コミッサーからこのメモを届けるように言われました」
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! An emergency meeting has been called in the Pit — we need you! The Commissar told me to deliver this note to you."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下！ピットと呼ばれる場所で、緊急会議が招集されました！コミッサーからこのメモを届けるように言われました」

languages.text: “大人！我们在指挥部召集了紧急会议，我们需要您到场！政委吩咐我把这封信交给您。”
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! An emergency meeting has been called in the Pit — we need you! The Commissar told me to deliver this note to you."

traits.locale_text: “大人！我们在指挥部召集了紧急会议，我们需要您到场！政委吩咐我把这封信交给您。”

languages.text: «¡Mi{mf|lord|lady}! Se ha convocado una reunión de emergencia en el foso, ¡{mf|le|la} necesitamos! El Comisario me ha dicho que le entregue esta nota».
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! An emergency meeting has been called in the Pit — we need you! The Commissar told me to deliver this note to you."

traits.locale_text: «¡Mi{mf|lord|lady}! Se ha convocado una reunión de emergencia en el foso, ¡{mf|le|la} necesitamos! El Comisario me ha dicho que le entregue esta nota».

languages.text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Es wurde ein Treffen im Loch einberufen, ein Notfall. Wir brauchen Euch! Der Kommissar hat mir gesagt, ich soll diese Nachricht überbringen."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! An emergency meeting has been called in the Pit — we need you! The Commissar told me to deliver this note to you."

traits.locale_text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Es wurde ein Treffen im Loch einberufen, ein Notfall. Wir brauchen Euch! Der Kommissar hat mir gesagt, ich soll diese Nachricht überbringen."

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie ! Une réunion d'urgence va se tenir dans la Fosse. On a besoin de vous ! Le commissaire m'a demandé de vous transmettre ce message. »
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! An emergency meeting has been called in the Pit — we need you! The Commissar told me to deliver this note to you."

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie ! Une réunion d'urgence va se tenir dans le gouffre. On a besoin de vous ! Le commissaire m'a demandé de vous transmettre ce message. »

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Çukur'da acil bir toplantı talep edildi. Size ihtiyacımız var! Komiser, bu notu size iletmemi söyledi."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! An emergency meeting has been called in the Pit — we need you! The Commissar told me to deliver this note to you."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Çukur'da acil bir toplantı talep edildi. Size ihtiyacımız var! Komiser, bu notu size iletmemi söyledi."
